game.title: It’s a Cop’s Deal
game.description: The game is a side scrolling platformed style game. The background of the game is basically that you are a ‘super cop’ created by team of scientists to clean up the city. The objective of the game is to kill as many enemies as possible and then reach the citizen at the end once defeating the boss. It only has one level of late. The game does have power ups and health packs which increase your health and unlock weapons. The game implements the following feature.
game.history: This game was designed as a project for university. It is inspired from the movie Robo-Cop just with a twist of adding mutants as the enemies.

features.feature: Make sure to stress that everything about this game is absolutely fabulous.
